title: 245. Being Malcolm Gladwell
description: "Books are a pain in the ass," says Gladwell, who has written some of the most popular, influential, and beloved non-fiction books in recent history. In this wide-ranging and candid conversation, he describes other pains in the ass -- as well as his passions, his limits, and why he'll never take up golf.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
